Headline: Temporary Northbound #62 Archer Reroute near Archer/Halsted
ShortDescription: Northbound 62 Archer buses are temporarily rerouted near Archer/Halsted.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #62 Archer buses are temporarily rerouted via Archer, Ashland, Cermak, Halsted, Archer into Orange Line terminal, and resume normal route, due to street blockage near Archer/Halsted.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
